title: Bharat Mela 2026 coming to Kuwait: 700+ artists set to showcase India’s vibrant heritage at Green Island
summary_full: Kuwait's coastline will transform into a vibrant celebration of Indian heritage with Bharat Mela 2026 on February 13, 2026. This free, open-air festival on Green Island's beachfront will feature over 700 artists, authentic Indian cuisine, and immersive crafts, fostering unity between Indian and Kuwaiti communities.
